name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce platforms at scale.
I care about making tools that developers actually want to use. From AI-powered dev workflows to MCP connectors, I focus on practical solutions that eliminate friction.
Built aiocean.io to explore AI agent tooling. Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016. Write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
My strongest work combines backend systems (Go, TypeScript) with AI tooling and MCP integration. Top projects include obsidian-open-gate (221⭐), jira-mcp (79⭐), and google-kit (20⭐).
I believe in iterative product development, pragmatic architecture, and shipping early. More interested in solving real problems than chasing perfect abstractions.
13 years of commits, 434 repos, still learning every day.
now: Iterating on vite-plugin-ai-annotator for AI-powered development
